content.html: This is *such* a tell. The beauty of Twitter (and of blogging for that matter) was that random interesting things might be elevated, might *become* popular. It is not a how-cool-am-I popularity contest.
content.value:
This is *such* a tell. The beauty of Twitter (and of blogging for that matter) was that random interesting things might be elevated, might *become* popular.

It is not a how-cool-am-I popularity contest.
